title: Expositio hymnorum secu[n]dum vsum Saru[m]
author: Catholic Church.
notes: Second pt. has special t.p., and separate pagination with title: Expositio sequentiarum secundum vsum Sarum.
Publisher from colophon, pt. 1, and date of publication from colophon, pt. 2.
Signatures: A-H⁶ I⁴ K-L⁶ M⁶(-M6) ²A⁸ ²B-L⁶.
Reproduction of original in the St. John's College (University of Oxford) Library.
